it.polimi.se2018.controller

Class ControllerTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.controller.ControllerTest

  • public class ControllerTest
extends java.lang.Object
    The unit tests for Controller.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ControllerTest() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void testActivateToolCardInvalidCard()
      Verifies that the toolCard chosen by the player is not activated if he tries to do activate a non existing toolCard.
      void testActivateToolCardNotYourTurn()
      Verifies that the toolCard chosen by the player is not activated if he tries to do it in another player's turn.
      void testActivateToolCardRequirementsNotSatisfied()
      Player can use a ToolCard, but not the selected one.
      void testActivateToolCardValid()
      Tests a valid activation of a toolCard.
      void testAddPublicScoreStrategy()
      Tests the setter of PublicScoreStrategies.
      void testApplyToolCardInvalidData()
      Case in which the useToolCard method return false.
      void testApplyToolCardNoActivation() 
      void testApplyToolCardNotYourTurn() 
      void testApplyToolCardValid()
      Verifies that tokens are reduced and that the hasAlreadyUsedToolCard flag is set when a toolCard is correctly used.
      void testApplyToolCardValidAndChangeTurn()
      Verifies that tokens are reduced and that the turn is updated when a toolCard is correctly used and the player has already placed a die.
      void testCanMoveNegative()
      The canMove method must return false because it is not the player's turn.
      void testCanMovePositive()
      The canMove method must return true because it is the player's turn.
      void testCheckTurnEndFalse()
      The checkTurnEndMethod must return false because the Player has not used the ToolCard yet, he only placed a die.
      void testCheckTurnEndTrue()
      Verifies that the checkTurnEnd returns true because the player has already placed a die and used a tool card.
      void testCleanDraftPool()
      This tests verifies that all the DraftPool's dice are put in the RoundTrack at the position indicated by the current round and that the draftPool is now empty.
      void testEndRoundGameFinished()
      Verifies that the game is ended in the right way cleaning the draftPool and filling the scoreBoard.
      void testEndRoundGameNotFinished()
      Verifies a correct updating of the round when the round is not the last one.
      void testEndTurnChangeRound()
      Verifies that the update of the turn when it is the last turn of a round happens in a correct way.
      void testEndTurnSameRound() 
      void testFillScoreBoardMustInvert()
      Verifies that the fillScoreBoard invert the order of players present in Game if it is right to do so.
      void testFillScoreBoardMustNotInvert()
      Verifies that the fillScoreBoard does not invert the order of players present in Game if it is not right to do so.
      void testFinalizeMatch()
      Verifies that the game reference is still present after the finalizeMatch invocation.
      void testFindPlayerNegative()
      Verifies that only added players are present in Game.
      void testFindPlayerPositive()
      Tests that a player is added to Game in the correct way.
      void testGetPublicScoreCalculators()
      Tests the getter of PublicScoreStrategies.
      void testPlaceDieAlreadyPlacedDie()
      Tests that if the player has already placed a die the die placement is not allowed.
      void testPlaceDieCorrectPlacement()
      Verifies that a die placement has been applied in a correct way.
      void testPlaceDieInvalidForcedSelection()
      Tests the case in which the die to be placed is the one indicated by the forcedSelectionIndex in the Turn class imposed by the use of some tool card and the player indicates a different index.
      void testPlaceDieNotYourTurn()
      Tests that if it is not the player's turn the die placement is not allowed.
      void testPlaceDieValidForcedSelection()
      Tests the case in which the die to be placed is the one indicated by the forcedSelectionIndex in the Turn class imposed by the use of some tool card and the player indicates the right index.
      void testPlaceDieWithTurnEnd()
      Verifies an automatic turn uploading when the player has already used a toolCard and he places a die.
      void testPlaceDieWrongDieSelection()
      Verifies that a die placement is not allowed if one of the placement rule is not respected.
      void testPlaceDieWrongPlacement()
      Verifies that a die placement is not allowed if one of the placement rule is not respected.
      void testRefillDraftPool()
      Verifies that the draftPool is refilled in a correct way when the refillDraftPoolMethod is invoked.
      void testSelectPatternInvalidPattern()
      Verifies that an error message is displayed and the pattern is not set if the SelectCard message for the pattern's choice is incorrect: the pattern name is wrong.
      void testSelectPatternInvalidPlayer()
      Verifies that an error message is displayed and the pattern is not set if the SelectCard message for the pattern's choice is incorrect: the player does not exists.
      void testSelectPatternValidAndGameReady()
      Verifies that the Pattern is correctly set and that the game is started because all the players have completed the Pattern selection step.
      void testSelectPatternValidButGameNotReady()
      Verifies that the Pattern is correctly set but the game is not started because not all the players have completed the Pattern selection step.
